wip: I started making my heavily homebrewed druid as a sample to import but didn't get very far

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.text: The naiad can breathe air and water.

invisibleInWater.name: Invisible in Water
invisibleInWater.description: {{description}} is invisible while fully immersed in water.
invisibleInWater.text: The naiad is invisible while fully immersed in water.

innateSpellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
innateSpellcasting.description: {{description}}'s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC {{trait:DC}}). {{pronoun:subject}} can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: {{trait:spellListInnate}}
innateSpellcasting.text:
The naiad's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 10). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: minor illusion
3/day: phantasmal force
1/day each: fly, hypnotic pattern

magicResistance.name: Magic Resistance
magicResistance.description: {{description}} has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
magicResistance.text: The naiad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

name: Thureg
multiattackString: The naiad makes two psychic touch attacks.
